description.value:
Especially on @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.psZBx1kcx9pHsLrz]{Apostae}, half-orcs are educated by the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.3kLK4WKPqNvFTwIB]{Drow} to be an expert in a particular vocation, filling that role throughout their lives. Such half-orcs gain Profession as a class skill. In addition, these half-orcs gain 1 additional skill rank per level, but this rank must be invested in the Profession skill.

This replaces intimidating.

modifiers.name: Professional Focus
modifiers.notes: Especially on @Compendium[sfrpg.setting.psZBx1kcx9pHsLrz]{Apostae}, half-orcs are educated by the @Compendium[sfrpg.races.3kLK4WKPqNvFTwIB]{Drow} to be an expert in a particular vocation, filling that role throughout their lives. Such half-orcs gain Profession as a class skill. In addition, these half-orcs gain 1 additional skill rank per level, but this rank must be invested in the Profession skill.
